name: Steve's Hardcore WorldTour (Kickstarter Demo)
description:
**NOT WHOLLY REPRESENTATIVE OF FINAL PRODUCT**
We are aware of some optimization issues. Please let us know in the comment or on our discord any problems you run into. 

The Kickstarter Demo is essentially a work in progress. Many of the core systems are finished. Our main goal is to polish things up and optimize the game. Afterwards we will add even more features.

Play the game with Keyboard or Gamepad. (Note: Menu currently requires keyboard)

Menu Controls: WASD to move. SPACE to select.

Check out the Kickstarter!

We plan to release the full game December 2021. Wishlist on Steam!

Twitter || Discord || Musician
